alert.note: Alert for Emanuel; Montgomery; Treutlen (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 30 at 6:27PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Emanuel, Treutlen and northern Montgomery Counties through 700 PM EST... At 627 PM EST, a strong thunderstorm was over Soperton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Swainsboro, Soperton, Adrian, Stillmore, Oak Park, Nunez, Tarrytown, Covena, Norristown, Norristown Junction, Lexsy, Blackville, Zaidee and Gillis Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EST for central, southeastern and east central Georgia.
